import React from 'react' import './contact.css' import {MdOutlineMarkEmailUnread} from 'react-icons/md' import {RiMessengerLine} from 'react-icons/ri' import {BsWhatsapp} from 'react-icons/bs' import { useRef } from 'react'; import emaijs from 'emailjs-com' const contact = () => { const form = useRef(); const sendEmail = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); emailjs.sendForm('service_g3kfkbn', 'template_wap7qdp', form.current, 'ftE8HkhQcCNe8Kds5') } return (
Get In Touch

) } export default contact
